name: Hotline Maceio
description:
Controls (Requires keyboard and mouse):

W A S D / Arrows - Move character
SPACE - Zoom Aim
M - Toggle mute audio
C - Display commands

Mouse - Aim
Mouse Left Click - Fire gun
Mouse Right Click - Melee

My first game ever, done solely for training purposes. Done on my second week into Construct 3. I created the sprites, but used the original tileset.

Hotline Miami is one of my fav games from past decade, so it was a natural choice for my first top down game.

What's your quickest run?
